message: “The help that Rochester Optical is providing to these women through this fundraiser is worth so much more than a piece of jewelry or a pair of glasses," said Christalin Velraj of Ruhamah’s Jewelry. "It’s a chance, a real chance at a normal life and we are so grateful to have partnered with them on this."

data.description: ROCHESTER, N.Y. (WHAM) - Rochester Optical has announced their partnership with local nonprofits, Freedom Firm and the Rochester Regional Coalition Against Human Trafficking in fundraising efforts to help end human trafficking of women and girls. Beginning
data.title: Rochester Optical announces fundraiser to help end human trafficking of women and girls
